text.en: Unfailing sources of refuge, the Three Jewels,
text.en-trans: kyabné luwa mepé könchok sum

text.en: And hosts of root and lineage gurus, whose kindness is beyond compare,
text.en-trans: tukjé tsungmé tsa gyü lamé tsok

text.en: I pray to you from the depths of my heart: inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: nying né solwa deb so jingyi lob

text.en: Always hold me in your compassion without ever wavering.
text.en-trans: taktu yelwa mepar tukjé zung

text.en: In the knowledge that devotion lies at the root of the path,
text.en-trans: mögü lam gyi tsawar shepa yi

text.en: As I take love and compassion as the path’s foundation,
text.en-trans: jam dang nyingjé lam gyi zhi zung né

text.en: And diligently apply myself to the twin stages of generation and completion,
text.en-trans: kyedzok rim nyi tsönpé lhurlen tsé

text.en: May the Three Jewels and the gurus always watch over me with compassion.
text.en-trans: chok sum lamé taktu tukjé zik

text.en: As I take the yoga of threefold solitude as a foundation,
text.en-trans: wenpa sum gyi naljor zhir zung né

text.en: And thoroughly exert myself in the practice of the three vajras,
text.en-trans: dorjé sum gyi nyamlen lek tsön tsé

text.en: May all adversity be pacified and favourable conditions abound,
text.en-trans: galkyen kün zhi tünkyen püntsok né

text.en: And may I develop the qualities of experience and realization.
text.en-trans: nyam dang tokpé yönten pelwar shok

text.en: With the profound view of realizing the natural state,
text.en-trans: tawa zabmö neluk tokpa dang

text.en: Profound meditation in which experience is plentiful,
text.en-trans: gompa zabmö nyamnyong pün sum tsok

text.en: And excellent conduct of the six transcendent perfections,
text.en-trans: chöpa zangpo chin druk la ten né

text.en: May I train in the path that delights the victorious ones.
text.en-trans: gyalwa gyepé lam la lobpar shok

text.en: May the virtue and excellence that spring from the noble deeds
text.en-trans: chöjé lama künkhyen yabsé kyi

text.en: Of the guru, lord of Dharma, the omniscient one and his heirs, increase.
text.en-trans: dzepa zangpö gelek gongpel né

text.en: And may the precious teachings, in explanation and in practice,
text.en-trans: shé dang drubpé tenpa rinpoche

text.en: Flourish and increase ever further just like the waxing moon!
text.en-trans: yar ngö da tar gong du pelwar shok
